title: 2018 Irish Abortion Referendum
description_short: List of campaign websites from Ireland's 2018 abortion referendum.
description_long:
On 25 May 2018, Ireland held a referendum to decide whether the country should repeal the Eighth Amendment of its constitution, which made abortion illegal unless the pregnancy was life-threatening.

The table below lists campaign organisations related to the referendum and their position on the issue (repeal or keep), along with links to live and archived versions of their websites.
